name: leARning
description:
LeARning is a lively mobile experience for kids.

• Through the AR technology, this app is able to support children in learning topics and concepts via funny interactive lessons and minigames.

• Download and print the cards, tidy up your desk and get ready to have a lot of fun learning with the fox!

Project designed and realized by Claudio Gargano in 3 months ( Nov2020 ~ Feb2021 )  within the Virtual Reality course  ( Politecnico di Torino).

Support my work on Ko-fi!
